section.section: The hours of work allowed under paragraph (1)(iv) of this subsection do not include any hours that a minor works in a bona fide work-study or student-learner program while school normally is in session.

text.section:
The Commissioner may grant to a minor an exception to the restrictions under this section if the Commissioner:
receives the written consent of a parent of the minor or a person standing in the place of the parent; and
determines that:
there will be no hazard to the health or welfare of the minor; and
granting the exception will not impede the minor in fulfilling school graduation requirements.
